class.name: ECMAScriptModule
class.brief_description: A ECMAScript module resource for managing ECMAScript source code and bytecode.
class.description: The JavaScriptModule class provides methods to manage ECMAScript source code and bytecode. It allows you to get and set both the source code and bytecode of a ECMAScript module.

method.name: get_bytecode
method.description: Returns the bytecode of the ECMAScript module as a [PoolByteArray].

method.name: get_source_code
method.description: Returns the source code of the ECMAScript module as a String.

method.name: set_bytecode
method.description: Sets the bytecode of the ECMAScript module using a [PoolByteArray].

method.name: set_source_code
method.description: Sets the source code of the ECMAScript module using a String.

members.member: The path to the ECMAScript script file.
